most birds are toothless ; a toothless crone ., 大多数的鸟都是无齿的 ; 一个无齿的丑老太婆.

entry.def: You use toothless to describe a person or their smile when they have no teeth.
If you describe something such as an official group or a law as toothless, you mean it has no real power and is not effective.

example.ex: In his view, the Commission remains a toothless and ineffectual body.
example.tran: 在他看来，委员会仍然是一个没有实权、不起作用的机构。
